Package org.agilej.sparkle.core.handler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArgumentResolverResolver
    resolver for handler resolver manager hold lots of handler resolver, and use the match one to resolve handler
    ControllerClassResolver  
    ControllerFactoryResolver  
    ControllerResolver
    get(create instance) controller object for given route, generally it will use ControllerClassResolver to get controller class first, then use ControllerFactory to get controller instance
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionMethodResolver  
    ArgumentResolverRegistration  
    ControllerActionExecutor
    Execute controller handler, if the handler is asynchronous it will not call the real handler and return (or wrap) a callable object for further async processing
    ControllerClassScanner
    Classpath controller class scanner, will both scan class annotated with Controller or subclass of ApplicationController; after scanning each controller class will have name from Controller's value or get from class name.
    ControllersHolder  
    CookiesArgumentResolver
    Argument resolver for param type with Cookies
    DefaultActionMethodParameter  
    ParamAnnotationArgumentResolver
    Argument resolver for handler annotated with Param
    ParamsArgumentResolver
    Argument resolver for param type with Params
    PathVariableArgumentResolver
    Argument resolver for handler annotated with PathVariable
    SessionAttributeArgumentResolver
    Argument resolver for handler annotated with SessionAttribute
    SimpleArgumentResolverResolver
    simple ArgumentResolverResolver which just iterate given handler resolver list and find the first match one
    SimpleControllerFactoryResolver
    Resolve ControllerFactory from configuration, will fallback to default GuiceControllerFactory if not configured.
    SimpleControllerResolver  
    WebRequestArgumentResolver
    Argument resolver for handler with type WebRequest
